Renaissance Road

Roads give a much bigger speed boost than before, felt from the Classical era to the Modern. As well as adding bridges, Classical roads reduce the [ICON_Movement] Movement cost by a modest amount. Renaissance roads reduce this further, and Modern roads cut it down to a tiny quarter [ICON_Movement] Movement point per tile. All roads allow units to ignore terrain-based movement penalties.
